item.description:
Crossroads Irish Pub Boston
495 Beacon Street (Boston, Beacon and Mass. Ave. intersection)
*Thursdays from 8 PM - 11:30 PM

Whether you're learning Japanese or English, buy a drink, join the table, and practice your new language in a friendly and relaxed environment. If you're a beginner or just interested in culture, you'll fit in fine! Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn and practice over a few drinks. Can't make it on time? Need to leave early? Not a problem. Just stop by if you can!

Please note that due to the location, you must be at least 21 to enter.

***Also, if you will be joining us, please use public transportation. Not only is driving while intoxicated dangerous, but there may not be any parking available in the area. Mass. Ave. also has street cleaning starting at midnight. Best methods for public transportation are the green line subway to the Hynes stop and/or bus #1 to the Beacon St. stop.

So join us! (I'll post a sign so you can find us)

~Lindsay
item.name: Japanese Evening Table
